item.title: Leaving Alteryx
item.description: After 2 years, last month marked the end of my time at Alteryx.

item.title: You cannot do data science without open source
item.description: While I had a strong feeling back in 2017 when I made my first open source library, itâ€™s even more clear today that you cannot do data science without open source.

item.title: Papers
item.description: Here’s a selection of papers I have authored or co-authored The Machine Learning Bazaar: Harnessing the ML Ecosystem for Effective System Development pdf Deep Feature Synthesis: Towards Automating Data Science Endeavors pdf Prediction Factory: automated development and collaborative evaluation of predictive models pdf Label, Segment, Featurize: a cross domain framework for prediction engineering pdf CommunityFinder: Software to Analyze Communities that Develop in MOOC Discussion Forums pdf Activity Classification using Smartphone Accelerometer Data pdf ColorCrack: Identifying Cracks in Glass pdf OK: OAuth 2.
